meta.description: The KSU Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory has modified the rabies antibody titer test, and if adapted, may help reduce the number of yearly vaccines for pets.

title: Will This Controversial Change Be Made to the Rabies Vaccine?
cleaned_text: Kansas State University’s Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory has modified the rabies antibody titer test, and if adopted, KSU says it will “cost pet owners less money and may help reduce the number of yearly vaccines for pets”

opengraph.title: Will This Controversial Change Be Made to the Rabies Vaccine?
opengraph.description: The KSU Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory has modified the rabies antibody titer test, and if adapted, may help reduce the number of yearly vaccines for pets.
